plot: Run, Tooru, Yuuko and Nagi are very close high school friends who go through their lives together. Their friendship goes beyond the classroom and academics with ranging from a pancake outing to a new year's shrine visit together.
opening_theme: "Balloon Theater (バルーンシアター)" by Marina Kawano
ending_theme: "Smile Houteishiki (スマイル方程式; Smile Equation)" by Kaori Fukuhara, Aoi Yūki, Yumi Uchiyama and Minako Kotobuki,
